summary.para: The CERT_ECC_SIGNATURE structure contains the r and s values for an Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signature.

remarks.para: Before encoding, a leading zero byte will be inserted for the r and s members. After decoding, a leading zero byte will be removed from the r and s members if the leading zero is present.

summary.para: The r value of the ECDSA signature. This value is in little-endian order.
The s value of the ECDSA signature. This value is in little-endian order.
